name: Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza
description:
Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza is an action-shooter game developed by Piranha Games. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Sierra Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza on PC.
It was produced by Chris Miller. It was directed by Bryan Ekman and Russ Bullock. Guy Whitmore scored the game.
